Class Triangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • Triangle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable, Shape

    public class Triangle
extends java.lang.Object
implements Shape
    Triangle class represents triangles. Triangle class implements Shape interface's methods.

        public Triangle(double xCoor1,
        double yCoor1,
        double xCoor2,
        double yCoor2,
        double xCoor3,
        double yCoor3,
        double side)
        Triangle constructor which takes a 3 x,y coordinate and also side length
        Parameters:
        xCoor1 - x1 coordinate of the point 1 of the triangle
        yCoor1 - y1 coordinate of the point 1 of the triangle
        xCoor2 - x2 coordinate of the point 2 of the triangle
        yCoor2 - y2 coordinate of the point 2 of the triangle
        xCoor3 - x3 coordinate of the point 3 of the triangle
        yCoor3 - y3 coordinate of the point 3 of the triangle
        side - side of the triangle
